page.title: 06Interview of the Day
page.content: "Good evening this is Andy Mac Donald eporting at Besson St, Newcross S.E.14, and I am talking to a Miss Sharon Collins. And I am here to see your area. Now for starters what sort of place do you live in Miss Collins" "Oh please call me Sharon" "Okay Sharon", "Well the streets are dirty" "Oh yes anything else about the street, do think that there is not alot of litter bins around, and do you think that there are to many sweet papers around" "no not really". "Have you any clubs in your area?" "Yes there are a few clubs but I dont the names of them". "What are the traffic lights like do you have to wait a long time for them change?" "Yes I do have to wait a long time" That was just some of the things that we have spoken about Goodbye.
